appDesc.message: Service helping to make smart online purchases

options_group_main_checkbox_7_text.description: Show the notifications about cash back activation on the sites where cash back is available

you_may_get_cashback.description: You can get cash back from this purchase. Do you want to buy with cash back?

help_popup_title_1.description: What do I do to buy with cash back?
help_popup_title_1.message: What do I do to buy with cash back?

help_popup_instr_2.description: Add item to the cart and make a purchase

help_popup_instr_3.description: In one minute after purchase you’ll receive notification about cash back being added
